column2: The character is currently away from home on a great quest.
You are not a true Dúnedian
The Blood of Númenor is waning, and though your family once counted itself among the high men of the West, you no longer have any real connection to that heritage.
Alas, for the lost glory of Númenor
Cultural (and Race) conversion in provinces by random event is blocked.
Was destroyed when the One Ring was destroyed by $KILLER$
Killed in the Downfall of Númenor
Killed when Sauron first occupied Mordor
The War of the Ring events will happen (circa 11360).
War of the Ring events will not occur.
Colonizing wilderness will be slow and costly.
Colonizing will take half the normal time.
Colonizing costs will be half normal.
Both the time and the cost of colonizing will be half normal.
Nothing is done to try and boost Good or Evil sides.
Events circa 9650 will launch the fall of Rhudaur, Carlodan, and Arthedian.
No events will happen to trigger the downfall of Rhudaur, Carlodan, or Arthedian.
Between 9978 and 10180, the Great Plague will appear in the East.
The Great Plague will not happen.
